name: Productivity system for Notion (minimalist GTD)
description: Why do we need GTD?Do not forget anything anymore. Free your mind of useless mental load. Focus. Get things done.Our "Getting Things Done" template is your key to unlocking unparalleled productivity. By streamlining your tasks and organizing your thoughts, it liberates your mind to focus on what truly matters.No more lost ideas or neglected tasks. With our template, your goals become attainable, your tasks become manageable, and your mind becomes free.Elevate your efficiency and harness the powe
features: A request, an idea or any “stuff” comes to you; Youthrow itinstantly in your “In basket”; "Waiting for" if you delegate it; "Next actions" if you will do it asap; "Projects" for larger topics; "Someday maybe / References" if it’s not actionable; Divideyour topics in subtasks to display a progress bar; Add an ETA to place your topics in thetimeline
